import React from "react"; import ContactForm from "./ContactForm"; import Jumbotron from "../partials/Jumbotron"; import Container from "react-bootstrap/esm/Container"; import Col from "react-bootstrap/esm/Col"; import Row from "react-bootstrap/Row"; import Map from "./Map"; const Contact = () => { return (

We're Local

  • 1317 W Airline Hwy, Suite L
    Laplace, La 70068

  • 1-504-858-3697
  • calebrasheartcpr@gmail.com
); }; export default Contact;
